data.market_trends: Rising interest in nature-based travel and eco-tourism continues to shape travel preferences in Iceland.
data.consumer_behavior: Travellers are increasingly researching destinations online prior to booking, focusing on reviews and social media influence.
data.competitive_landscape: Iceland faces competition from other destinations offering Northern Lights experiences, yet it maintains a strong brand identity tied to its unique geography and cultural richness.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel behaviors are heavily influenced by seasonal changes; winter sees a peak in Northern Lights tourism while summer attracts those interested in hiking and sightseeing.
